title: 820-3115 - no image. has backlight
message:
This was a known good board for testing. i needed some readings and made an accident.

My hand accidentally slip and shorted C9796's 30v to L9080's pin 2.
now the LVDS_conn_A_clk_f_p line is fuked.
this line talk to the PCH.

diode mode on L9080's pin 2 is 0.227
diode mode on L9080's pin 3 is 0.552

i've changed L9080 and didnt help :)

laptop turn on with backlight but no image
i dont have a BGA machine. so this board can turn into mac mini or is there another way to fix it?

title: 820-3115 - no image. has backlight
message: Yeah dead PCH. Also need to fix the BIOS with a clean ME region after replacing the PCH.

title: 820-3115 - no image. has backlight
message: duke, let me send it to you to replace the pch, will pay you of course :P, otherwise watch out on uk ebay.

title: 820-3115 - no image. has backlight
message: If you want to send it to NL then fine. I'm also in B'ham in 10 days, so you can send it to the UK and I can bring it back to NL. Contact in PM if interested.
